amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit civil lawsuits by a food manufacturer or seller or trade association against an individual for consumption of a qualified product.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit lawsuits by a food manufacturer or seller or trade association against an individual.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
